Plot
In Los Angeles, Detective Hank Holten (Kevin Dillon) is obsessed by his ex-wife, 
the writer of vampire novels Susan Hastings (Vanessa Angel), stalking her and 
having drinking problems. His chief and friend, Captain John Billings 
(Lance Henriksen), makes him promise to forget her and stop drinking, and assigns 
Hank to find Layla Simmons (Jody Lyn O&#039;Keefe), who is missing and without notice 
to her family. Hank goes to a rave party, finds Layla, they go to an orgy party 
in an old building, and while having sex with her, Hank finds that the place is 
a vampire nest. He is bitten by the vampire-leader, but nobody believes on him. 
He looks for Susan to help him.
